Articles.Content: Has anyone mapped the 0.21 version of Duna yet? The page at http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Duna is a little out of date. I'm trying to find a low-lying area is, so I can land a glider.
I'd say you'll find it somewhere on those dark patches, near the middle.
On a related note, does anyone know the flattest area on Duna? I want to try a spaceplane landing, but the dark areas up close are a lot more hilly than they seem and I end up crashing
the flattest I think would be that large dark canyon
The terrain has changed in the latest version, it seems like there are no "landing strips" anymore.

The terrain has changed in the latest version, it seems like there are no "landing strips" anymore.

That's disappointing
As of 0.21 Duna's lowest point is 125 m at -50.55, -5.95. The highest point is 8264 m at -106.80, 20.88. Cords in Lon, Lat.
